text: Waited 30minutes just for 1order of cream pasta at tenderbest. Only packs grab orders and started cooking only when i check at 25minutes mark. Basically it takes 5minutes to make but they prioritise all the grab orders and the food were just placed there without anyone collecting. Never patronise the tenderbest here for dine ins. The drink stall uncle was very nice and helpful when ordering the drinks tho ++

I bought a drink here. The waiter was very rude.My child couldn't understand English, so I went forward to ask about the bag. She said she had just inquired.It also shows how my child can't understand English! We are not locals.
Beware and avoid of the crazy aunty around lunch hours, will be sitting there for hours either idling or cursing random patrons there, be careful guys! Spoilt mood sia

4 stars for the Lao Shi Jie bak kut teh store. Tasty and fresh pork and organs. Good service. Generous portions. Price slightly on the high side but worth it.

Warning, the ice Milo kosong is $2.30..
its 24 hrs,so not much to choose, I reach there nearly 2AM, only left Tim sum but not bad.
